metadata.title: CVE-2022-21423 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.28 and prior. Easilyexploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with networkaccess via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successfulattacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause apartial denial of service (partial DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 BaseScore 2.7 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
